synthesis_conditions.label: temperature
synthesis_conditions.details: Room temperature for gas adsorption and separation experiments

synthesis_conditions.label: equipment
synthesis_conditions.details: Packed column for gas separation experiments

synthesis_conditions.label: gas_adsorption_capacity_measurement_temperature
synthesis_conditions.details: 273, 298, and 318 K for single-component adsorption isotherms for C2H2, C2H4, and C2H6

synthesis_conditions.label: drying_method
synthesis_conditions.details: Activated TJT-100 was used for gas adsorption and separation experiments, implying a prior activation process which typically involves drying and/or degassing to remove solvent molecules

synthesis_conditions.label: computational_studies
synthesis_conditions.details: Grand canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulations and in situ IR measurements were conducted to understand gas-framework interactions
